topic.title: ODUCn / ODUjk MUX / DMX Datapath Segment Provisioning

body.p: High Order (HO) ODUCn / ODUjk and Low Order (LO) ODUjk multiplexing datapath segments are provisioned with the API g5_api_odu_mux_cfg(). This API is called after the OTUk or OTUCn port has been provisioned, or after the High Order multiplexing datapath segment has been provisioned. When the API g5_api_odu_mux_cfg() is configured as the second stage of ODUjk multiplexing, the LINEOTN interface may have up to 500G of provisioned SERDES ports. If 600G of SERDES ports are provisioned then the second stage of ODUjk multiplexing is unavailable.

Figure 1 shows the datapath segment provisioning for High Order ODUCn or ODUjk multiplexing. Initially the segment is provisioned from the High Order ODUC / ODU framer(A) to the OCPB block(C) and will remain for ODUCn multiplexing or 1-stage ODUjk multiplexing mode. However, if a Low Order ODUjk multiplexing datapath segment is provisioned following the High Order segment provisioning, the datapath segment for the High Order ODUC / ODUk is from the High Order ODUC / ODU framer(A) to the input of the Low Order multiplexer block(B).

fig.title: HO ODUC / ODUk Mux Datapath Segment Provisioning: HO ODUC or ODUjk Multiplexing

body.p: Figure 2 shows the datapath segment provisioning for Low Order ODUjk multiplexing. The segment is provisioned from the Low Order ODU framer(A) to the OCPB block(B).

fig.title: LO ODUk Mux Datapath Segment Provisioning: LO ODUjk Multiplexing
